quest.10F792474C01A594.title: &fWelcome to &6Occultism&f!
quest.10F792474C01A594.quest_desc1: &6Occultism&r is a magic mod focused around summoning &bSpirits&r and using their powers and skills to your advantage.
quest.10F792474C01A594.quest_desc3: To get started, break some grass to find &aDemon's Dream Seeds&r.
quest.10F792474C01A594.quest_desc5: The &6Dictionary of Spirits&r is the ultimate guidebook for the mod. It's also needed for certain recipes, and can be used to create &bholograms&r to help you build out &dRituals&r!
chapter.366003AD7B6B722C.title: Occultism
quest.4E90956E9A3ADAC9.title: &fDemon's Dream Fruit
quest.4E90956E9A3ADAC9.quest_desc1: Once you've planted a few Demon's Dream Seeds, you can harvest them to acquire &aDemon's Dream Fruit&r.
quest.4E90956E9A3ADAC9.quest_desc3: Consuming &aDemon's Dream Fruit&r gives you the effect of the &bThird Eye&r, allowing you to interact with &9The Otherworld&r and granting you knowledge of things not known to mere mortals.
quest.4E90956E9A3ADAC9.quest_desc5: For now, you can only obtain this effect by eating a &aDemon's Dream Fruit&r, but this will change as you deepen your knowledge of the occult.
quest.76323B3FF4F17A2B.title: &fIt Burns!!!
quest.76323B3FF4F17A2B.quest_desc1: You'll need items from the &9Otherworld&r to progress further, and &aSpirit Fire&r does just that.
quest.76323B3FF4F17A2B.quest_desc3: Throwing a &aDemon's Dream Fruit&r on the ground and setting it on fire will produce &dSpirit Fire&r, which never burns out and does not harm entities.
quest.76323B3FF4F17A2B.quest_desc5: Throwing items into the &dSpirit Fire&r will convert them into their &9Otherworld&r equivalent.
task.183FEFA2AEF46058.title: Observe &aSpirit Fire
quest.0A63C6F9B76293DB.title: &fDivination Rod
quest.0A63C6F9B76293DB.quest_desc1: The &aDivination Rod&r helps you find nearby &aOtherworld&r materials.
quest.0A63C6F9B76293DB.quest_desc3: To do this, the Rod must first be attuned to the normal world equivalent by sneak-right clicking the block with the rod.
quest.0A63C6F9B76293DB.quest_desc5: Once attuned, you can hold down right click to use the Rod until the animation in the gem finishes. This will highlight the closest corresponding block.
quest.0A63C6F9B76293DB.quest_desc7: To see a list of items you can attune to, check the next page!
quest.0A63C6F9B76293DB.quest_desc14: Right-clicking the &aRod&r without holding after a successful search will show the last found target block again.
quest.0A63C6F9B76293DB.quest_desc16: The crystal changes between white and purple to indicate how close you are to the block found. White means nothing was found. The more purple you see, the closer you are to the block.
quest.465A950126ABF758.title: &aOtherworld Groves
quest.465A950126ABF758.quest_desc1: Have you ever gone caving and stumbled onto a random fully grown tree? That's most likely an &2Otherworld Grove&r.
quest.465A950126ABF758.quest_desc3: &2Otherworld Groves&r are overgrown caves filled with &aOtherworld Trees&r and walls of made of &3Otherstone&r.
quest.465A950126ABF758.quest_desc5: &aOtherworld Trees&r appear as oak trees to the naked eye, but reveal their true form under the &bThird Eye&r effect.
quest.465A950126ABF758.quest_desc7: &2Otherworld Saplings&r can only be obtained by breaking &aOtherworld Leaves&r manually.
quest.633843210DE84A0D.title: &fFoundation Chalks
quest.633843210DE84A0D.quest_desc3: &eFoundation Chalks&r are tiered chalks that can be used interchangeably with other colorless chalks, as long as they can summon the approriate tier. They come in four different colors:
quest.633843210DE84A0D.quest_desc10: More advanced &bRituals&r will require a better &eFoundation Chalk&r.
quest.633843210DE84A0D.quest_desc12: ["As an example, you can use ", {"text": "Black Chalk", "color": "#000000"}, " in place of White, ", {"text": "Light Gray", "color": "#C6C6C6"}, ", or ", {"text": "Gray", "color": "#929292"}, " glyphs for any ", {"text": "Pentacle", "color": "#55FFFF"}, ". However, White cannot be used in place of ", {"text": "Light Gray", "color": "#C6C6C6"}, ", ", {"text": "Gray", "color": "#929292"}, ", or ", {"text": "Black Chalk", "color": "#000000"}, " glyphs."]
task.2E079C677B170563.title: &fFoundation Chalks
quest.62BB8F93956480BA.title: &bSpirits
quest.62BB8F93956480BA.quest_desc1: &aBook of Bindings&r are used to summon different &bSpirit&r tiers, and can be acquired by tossing a book and quill into &aSpirit Fire&r.
quest.62BB8F93956480BA.quest_desc3: To identify a &bSpirit&r to summon, it's name must be written in a &aBook of Binding&r and then combined with a &aDictionary of Spirits&r, resulting in a &aBound Book of Binding&r.
quest.62BB8F93956480BA.quest_desc5: &bSpirit&r names are only used as flair and do not impact the recipe. As long as you have the right &bSpirit Tier&r, your &aBound Book&r can be used.
quest.62BB8F93956480BA.quest_desc14: The &aBound Book&r that is required to complete a &bRitual&r will be based on the tier of the &bSpirit&r you are trying to summon, and the &bPentacle&r tier you use.
quest.3031334952FA6DCC.title: &aPreparing For A Ritual
quest.3031334952FA6DCC.quest_desc1: &aRituals&r will require more than just some symbols drawn on the ground!
quest.3031334952FA6DCC.quest_desc3: Each ritual will need several &aSacrificial Bowls&r, which are used to place items that will be sacrificed to perform the ritual. For the first ritual, you will only need four of these.
quest.3031334952FA6DCC.quest_desc5: The &aGolden Sacrificial Bowl&r is the centerpiece of the ritual &bPentacle&r. This bowl will hold the key item used in the ritual, which is usually a &dBound Book&r.
quest.3031334952FA6DCC.quest_desc7: For the regular &aSacrificial Bowls&r, the exact placement does not matter as long as they are within 8 blocks of the &aGolden Sacrificial Bowl&r.
quest.3031334952FA6DCC.quest_desc9: What type of ritual is it if it doesn't require some &eCandles&r! Any vanilla candle will do.
quest.3031334952FA6DCC.quest_desc11: If you want to get special with it, you can also make &aLarge Candles&r using Tallow.
quest.3031334952FA6DCC.quest_desc13: To get &aTallow&r, you will need to kill large animals with a &aButcher's Knife&r. Large animals include:
quest.6338A56F731A5F25.title: &eFamiliar Rituals
quest.6338A56F731A5F25.quest_desc1: &eFamiliar Rituals&r summon &bSpirits&r to inhabit an animal's body, allowing them to resist decay and provide buffs to the summoner.
quest.6338A56F731A5F25.quest_desc3: Some of these buffs can be acquire by binding the &eFamiliar&r to a &aFamiliar Ring&r and equipping it.
quest.6338A56F731A5F25.quest_desc5: Most &eFamiliars&r will behave like tamed animals, following the player unless instructed not to.
task.5BE8C72BDBCC78CE.title: &eFamiliar Rituals
quest.0EBEF0B2D2F13C3D.title: &ePossession Rituals
quest.0EBEF0B2D2F13C3D.quest_desc1: &ePossession Rituals&r bind &bSpirits&r into living beings, giving the summoner a degree of control over the possessed being.
quest.0EBEF0B2D2F13C3D.quest_desc3: As such, these &bRituals&r are used to obtain rare items without having to venture into dangerous places.
task.6B0602266368826B.title: &ePossession Rituals
quest.51D07B8762C46982.title: &eBinding Rituals
quest.51D07B8762C46982.quest_desc1: &eBinding Rituals&r channel &bSpirits&r into items, imbuing them with powers dedicated to a single purpose.
quest.51D07B8762C46982.quest_desc3: The starting Pentacle for this Ritual type is &aEziveus' Spectral Compulsion&r.
quest.51D07B8762C46982.quest_desc5: These items can serve as simple enhancements or perform complex functions to assist the player.
task.4F725B8E1BB9B8D1.title: &eBinding Rituals
quest.6137DE875E13EF72.title: &eSummoning Rituals
quest.6137DE875E13EF72.quest_desc1: &eSummoning Rituals&r force &bSpirits&r to enter this world in a chosen shape, setting them to a specific task.
quest.6137DE875E13EF72.quest_desc3: You've already made the first tier of Summoning Pentacle: &aAviar's Circle&r.
quest.6137DE875E13EF72.quest_desc5: These tasks can range from item manipulation and trading, to slave-like helpers for manual labour.
task.34F38A214F5DEFC3.title: &eSummoning Rituals
quest.3BCB8667CCEBAE57.title: &aStorage Actuator Base
quest.3BCB8667CCEBAE57.quest_desc1: The &aStorage Actuator Base&r is the first of two parts needed to access your storage dimension.
quest.3BCB8667CCEBAE57.quest_desc3: This block functions very much like a big shulker box. This means that when breaking the &aDimensional Storage Actuator&r, your items will stay safe inside the block.
quest.1EAF085D3C13253B.title: &cInfused Pickaxe
quest.1EAF085D3C13253B.quest_desc1: &9Otherworld&r ores usually can only be mined with &9Otherworld&r metal tools.
quest.1EAF085D3C13253B.quest_desc3: The &aInfused Pickaxe&r is a makeshift solution to this problem.
quest.1EAF085D3C13253B.quest_desc5: Brittle &aSpirit Attuned Gems&r house a &cDjinni&r that allows harvesting the ores, but the durability is extremely low.
quest.0FC3672189B0854D.title: &cIesnium
quest.0FC3672189B0854D.quest_desc1: &cIesnium&r is a rare metal that can be acquired by breaking red, purple, and blue barrels in the &cNether&r.
quest.0FC3672189B0854D.quest_desc3: &cIesnium&r ore can be processed like most other ores. You can also place it down, which enables it to be mined with any other pickaxe, dropping &aRaw Iesnium&r.
quest.0FC3672189B0854D.quest_desc5: &cIesnium Ingots&r can be used to craft the &cIesnium Pickaxe&r, &cSpirit Lamps&r, or other powerful items.
quest.2AAD4463A90C639B.title: &cDimensional Mineshaft
quest.2AAD4463A90C639B.quest_desc1: The &aDimensional Mineshaft&r is used to harverst resources from an uninhabited mining dimension.
quest.2AAD4463A90C639B.quest_desc3: The &aDimensional Mineshaft&r will discard any items it cannot store, so it is important to regularly empty the mineshaft.
quest.2AAD4463A90C639B.quest_desc5: &bSpirits&r in lamps can be inserted from the top, and items can be extracted from all other sides.
quest.2AAD4463A90C639B.quest_desc7: The &aDimensional Mineshaft&r has two interactions with redstone:
quest.2AAD4463A90C639B.quest_desc9: 1) The &bSpirit&r will stop working when receiving a redstone signal.
quest.2AAD4463A90C639B.quest_desc11: 2) A comparator can be used to get a redstone signal based on occupied slots and lamp durability.
quest.0A51EA0A6CC0327F.title: &7Foliot Miner
quest.0A51EA0A6CC0327F.quest_desc1: The &7Foliot Miner&r harvests random blocks, returning anything it finds.
quest.0A51EA0A6CC0327F.quest_desc3: It is quite slow and inefficient, degrading its lamp much faster than other miners.
quest.2E1CE18A917C637C.title: &cOre Miner Djinni
quest.2E1CE18A917C637C.quest_desc1: The &cOre Miner Djinni&r only harvests ores.
quest.2E1CE18A917C637C.quest_desc3: It is able to mine faster more efficiently than the &7Foliot&r. Because of it's speed, however, it damages its lamp faster.
quest.60984D2D55BF2E24.title: &dDeep Ore Afrit Miner
quest.60984D2D55BF2E24.quest_desc1: The &dDeep Ore Afrit Miner&r harvests ores like the &cDjinni&r, and additionally mines deepslate ores.
quest.60984D2D55BF2E24.quest_desc3: It is faster and more efficient, damaging its lamp even more slowly.
quest.264C4CE122513D7B.title: &6Master Marid Miner
quest.264C4CE122513D7B.quest_desc1: The &6Master Marid Miner&r is the most powerful miner &bSpirit&r.
quest.264C4CE122513D7B.quest_desc3: It has the fastest mining speed and best lamp preservation. Unlike other miners, they can also mine rare ores like &dAncient Debris&r and &dIesnium Ore&r.
quest.4CDCFE544B72E6C4.title: &5Eldritch Ancient Miner
quest.4CDCFE544B72E6C4.quest_desc1: The &5Eldritch Ancient Miner&r harvests entire blocks of raw ore at once.
quest.4CDCFE544B72E6C4.quest_desc3: Compressing the &6Master Marid Miner&r has given you an extremely powerul and efficient miner.
quest.38705F990589B2E8.title: &dIesnium Sacrificial Bowl
quest.38705F990589B2E8.quest_desc1: The &dIesnium Sacrificial Bowl&r is an upgrade to the standard &aGolden Sacrifical Bowl&r.
quest.63516E977D8BC7C4.title: &5Eldritch Chalice
quest.63516E977D8BC7C4.quest_desc1: The &5Eldritch Chalice&r is an upgraded version of the &dIesnium Sacrificial Bowl&r, which will instantly perform any ritual.
quest.1316B86CF011B016.title: &6Iesnium Anvil
quest.1316B86CF011B016.quest_desc1: The &6Iesnium Anvil&r is a &6Marid&r infusion improving regular anvil functions
quest.1316B86CF011B016.quest_desc4: - It can exceed the maximum level of enchantments by 1.
quest.1316B86CF011B016.quest_desc5: - &6Marid&r will pay half of the showed level cost.
quest.1316B86CF011B016.quest_desc6: - The cost increase of working with the same item is reduced.
quest.1316B86CF011B016.quest_desc7: - The maximum cost limit is increased.
quest.27E0738B56C6ED8C.title: &aSurprisingly Substantial Satchel
quest.27E0738B56C6ED8C.quest_desc1: Binding a &7Foliot&r to the satchel significantly increases its storage capacity, making it a great travel companion.
quest.6A84F3464CD7F0D5.title: &cFeeling Lazy?
quest.6A84F3464CD7F0D5.quest_desc1: A &aRitual Satchel&r can hold items needed to create &bPentacles&r used in &bRituals&r, and can automatically place the right item directly onto the ground.
quest.6A84F3464CD7F0D5.quest_desc3: You must have selected a &bPentacle&r layout from the &aDictionary of Spirits&r in order for the satchel to know what to select.
quest.4B4DFB318CE36DAE.title: &6Rainbow Chalk
quest.4B4DFB318CE36DAE.quest_desc1: The &6Rainbow Chalk&r can replace any non-foundation chalk (white, gray, light gray, black).
quest.4B4DFB318CE36DAE.quest_desc3: It also comes with extra features:
quest.4B4DFB318CE36DAE.quest_desc5: - Using a &aSpirit Attuned Gem&r in the off-hand toggles the random color changes, or use any dye to set the glyph color.
quest.4B4DFB318CE36DAE.quest_desc7: - Using this chalk on a glyph while crouching will erase the glyph, acting as a &aChalk Brush&r.
quest.4B4DFB318CE36DAE.quest_desc9: The &6Rainbow Chalk&r can also be used to make &5Void Chalk&r.
quest.4B4DFB318CE36DAE.quest_desc11: &5Void Chalk&r is an upgraded version of the &6Rainbow Chalk&r that can replace any chalk including foundation chalk.
quest.097B18EFDA7DC983.title: &cSoul Gems
quest.097B18EFDA7DC983.quest_desc1: &aSoul Gems&r are used to capture a single entity.
quest.097B18EFDA7DC983.quest_desc5: Using a &aSoul Gem&r that has a captured spirit, you can create a &cFamiliar Ring&r.
quest.097B18EFDA7DC983.quest_desc7: The &aFamiliar Ring&r provides a buff depending on the &eFamiliar&r captured within.
quest.3FB2A1A98B36234F.title: &5Trinity Gem
quest.3FB2A1A98B36234F.quest_desc1: The &5Trinity Gem&r is an upgraded version of the &cSoul Gem&r and is able to capture almost any mob.
quest.3B37556B49098933.title: &aOtherworld Goggles
quest.3B37556B49098933.quest_desc1: The &aOtherworld Goggles&r give the wearer permanent &bThird Eye&r effect, granting vision of &9Otherworld&r blocks.
quest.2160C6D61B76C8FE.title: &eMagical Storage
quest.2160C6D61B76C8FE.quest_desc1: &6Occultism's&r upgradeable storage system allows you to store your items in a separate dimension of &9The Otherworld&r.
quest.2160C6D61B76C8FE.quest_desc3: Don't worry about them floating away in the void though, we have insurance for that.
task.6130E9ED81C8EECD.title: &eMagical Storage
quest.2DA5BB792D9C2E30.title: &aHedyrin's Familiars
quest.2DA5BB792D9C2E30.quest_desc1: Using &aHedyrin's Lure&r you can summon &eFamiliars&r that can perform tasks or provide buffs to the player.
quest.2DA5BB792D9C2E30.quest_desc3: &aBeaver&r: Chops down nearby small trees, and increases wood break speed
quest.2DA5BB792D9C2E30.quest_desc4: - Upgraded: Gives free snacks when right-clicked with an empty hand
quest.2DA5BB792D9C2E30.quest_desc6: &aDeer&r: Step Assist, Increased Speed, and Jump Boost
quest.2DA5BB792D9C2E30.quest_desc7: - Upgraded: Extra Step Assist and attacks nearby enemies with a hammer.
quest.2DA5BB792D9C2E30.quest_desc9: &aGreedy&r: Picks up neargy items and increases pickup range
quest.2DA5BB792D9C2E30.quest_desc10: - Upgraded: Looks for items for its master.
quest.2DA5BB792D9C2E30.quest_desc12: &aParrot&r: Provides company to its caring owner.
quest.2DA5BB792D9C2E30.quest_desc13: - Has no upgradeable Effect, as such, it cannot be upgraded.
task.772E7B17FF9CE76E.title: &fSummon a &aBeaver
task.185302C49E85B5E3.title: &fSummon a &aDeer
task.734212F4FDFDAD92.title: &fSummon a &aGreedy Familiar
task.5FD3ED03945F754B.title: &fSummon a &aParrot
task.15B36BA190076579.title: &aHedyrin's Familiars
task.4DC9AD2844DE4A7A.title: Complete This Quest
quest.720D8E574EB9D689.title: &cIhagan's Enthrallment Familiars
quest.720D8E574EB9D689.quest_desc1: Using &cIhagan's Enthrallment&r you can summon many powerful &eFamiliars&r that can aid or provide buffs to the player.
quest.720D8E574EB9D689.quest_desc6: &aBeholder&r: Highlights nearby entities, shoots lazer rays, eats Shub Niggurath babies to gain temporary damage and speed
quest.720D8E574EB9D689.quest_desc10: - Upgraded: Acts as a mobile light source
quest.720D8E574EB9D689.quest_desc12: &aDevil&r: Attacks enemies and provides Fire Resistance
quest.720D8E574EB9D689.quest_desc15: &aDragon&r: Can be ridden by &eGreedy Familiars&r, acquiring its effects. Increases XP gains
quest.720D8E574EB9D689.quest_desc16: - Upgraded: Attacks nearby enemies by throwing swords
quest.720D8E574EB9D689.quest_desc18: &aDrikwing&r: Provides Multi-Jump, Slow Fall, and Jump Boost
quest.720D8E574EB9D689.quest_desc21: &aFairy&r: Prevents other &eFamiliars'&r death (on cooldown), Buffs &eFamiliars&r, Drains nearby enemies' HP.
quest.720D8E574EB9D689.quest_desc24: &aHeadless&r: Steals heads of nearby enemies to gain a permanent damage buff against that enemy type. It is killed if it drops below 50% health, but can be be revived when given Wheat, Sticks, Hay Bale, and a Carved Pumpkin
task.7A024E88591A8862.title: &fSummon a &aBat
task.145F4045BA952DD9.title: &fSummon a &aBeholder
task.5BF75EED8F2F48DC.title: &fSummon a &aCthulhu
task.2951F1493E615F65.title: &fSummon a &aDevil
task.5483D23444F3E019.title: &fSummon a &aDragon
task.5336018EE8A0D660.title: &fSummon a &aDrikwing
task.2EE3E482A1A9CA90.title: &fSummon a &aFairy
task.36580E6B2C957FE0.title: &fSummon a &aHeadless
task.582842DFA3989416.title: &fSummon a &aMummy
task.10328EE3113F66B2.title: &cIhagan's Familiars
task.71AA419C13D74934.title: Complete This Quest
quest.41C7ED53AA36D647.title: &cDjinni Time Mage
quest.41C7ED53AA36D647.quest_desc1: &cDjinnis&r can be used to fastforward time to &aDawn&r or &aDusk&r, depending on your needs.
quest.41C7ED53AA36D647.quest_desc3: &eTime Spirits&r will modify time once before vanishing.
task.67773EAE20B67BD2.title: Summon a &cDawn Spirit
task.75950ADE1D19EBBB.title: Summon a &cDusk Spirit
quest.5CC11DF487EA2867.title: &7Foliot &fJanitor
quest.5CC11DF487EA2867.quest_desc1: The &7Foliot Janitor&r will pick up dropped items and deposit them into a target inventory.
quest.5CC11DF487EA2867.quest_desc3: To bind the &7Foliot Janitor&r to an inventory simply sneak + right-click with the &aJanitor Book of Calling&r on that inventory.
quest.5CC11DF487EA2867.quest_desc5: You can also have the &7Foliot Janitor&r wander around a select area by pulling up that interface.
quest.5CC11DF487EA2867.quest_desc7: Sneak + right-click the &7Foliot Janitor&r to configure an allow/block list to specify which items to pick up or ignore. This is set to allow mode by default, so it will only pick up items you specify in the list. You can use tags to handle whole groups of items.
task.250E86F309F06DC5.title: Summon a &7Foliot Janitor
quest.2D913EC86DC39C3C.title: &cDjinni Weather Mage
quest.2D913EC86DC39C3C.quest_desc1: The &cDjinni Sunshine Spirit&r can be used to clear the weather.
quest.2D913EC86DC39C3C.quest_desc3: &eWeather Spirits&r will modify the weather once before vanishing.
task.0F323A1897237ED1.title: Summon a &cSunshine Spirit
quest.556EAFDA42D7C5C9.title: &7Foliot &fLumberjack
quest.556EAFDA42D7C5C9.quest_desc1: The &7Foliot Lumberjack&r will harvest trees within its working area, collect and deposit dropped items into the specified chest, and re-plant saplings.
quest.556EAFDA42D7C5C9.quest_desc3: Use the &aLumberjack Book of Calling&r to set the work area and deposit location of the &7Foliot Lumberjack&r.
quest.556EAFDA42D7C5C9.quest_desc5: Summoning the &7Foliot Lumberjack&r requires a &aStable Otherworld Sapling&r, which you can get as a trade from the &aOtherworld Sapling Trader&r summon.
quest.556EAFDA42D7C5C9.quest_desc7: &eNote&r: The &7Foliot&r may pause for a while after clearing his work area even if trees have regrown since. This is a performance-saving measure and not a bug. He will continue on his own, but you can set the work area again to make him continue work immediately.
task.63B6D52741114570.title: Summon a &7Foliot Lumberjack
quest.0110781538FD5DC2.title: &7Foliot &fTransporter
quest.0110781538FD5DC2.quest_desc1: The &7Foliot Transporter&r can take from and deposit to any inventory, including machines and &bSpirit&r.
quest.0110781538FD5DC2.quest_desc3: To set the blocks the &7Foliot Transporter&r can interact with, simply sneak + right-click with the &aTransporter Book of Calling&r on the inventory you want to deposit to or extract from.
quest.0110781538FD5DC2.quest_desc5: By default the &7Foliot Transporter&r is in whitelist mode and will not move anything. Shift + right-click it to open the config UI where you can then add items to the filter list to make it move only those items, or set it to blacklist to move everything except the filtered items. You can also enter a tag in the text field below to filter by tag.
task.52DC2C96BC93F381.title: Summon a &7Foliot Transporter
quest.357591103765D4EF.title: &cDjinni Machine Operator
quest.357591103765D4EF.quest_desc1: The &cMachine Operator&r transfers items specified in the &aDimensional Storage Actuator's&r interface to its managed machine and brings back the crafting results.
quest.357591103765D4EF.quest_desc3: It can also be used to automatically empty a chest into the &aStorage Actuator&r.
quest.357591103765D4EF.quest_desc5: To use the &cMachine Operator&r use its &aBook of Calling&r to link a &aStorage Actuator&r, the machine, and optionally a separate extract location.
quest.357591103765D4EF.quest_desc7: For the machine you can additionally set a custom name and the insert/extract sides. Please note that setting a new machine will reset the extraction settings
task.0B432770D3EE9EC1.title: Summon a &cMachine Operator
quest.1841C1DAEC960312.title: &7Foliot &fSmelter
quest.1841C1DAEC960312.quest_desc1: All tiers of &bSmelter Spirits&r are summoned to do furnace, blast furnace, smoker, and campfire processes without using fuel.
quest.1841C1DAEC960312.quest_desc3: They will pick up the appropriate items, smelt them, and then drop them back into the world.
quest.1841C1DAEC960312.quest_desc5: A fire particle effect and a flame sound indicate the &bSmelter&r is at work.
quest.1841C1DAEC960312.quest_desc7: To automate this, summon a &7Foliot Transporter&r to place items from chests in the &bSmelter's&r inventory, and a &7Foliot Janitor&r to collect the processed items.
task.020E0F95DC60069D.title: Summon a &7Foliot Smelter
quest.78C04CC1114AECF7.title: &7Foliot &fOtherworld Sapling Trader
quest.78C04CC1114AECF7.quest_desc1: &aOtherworld Trees&r grown from natural &aOtherworld Saplings&r can only be harvested when under the effect of &bThird Eye&r.
quest.78C04CC1114AECF7.quest_desc3: To make life easier, the &7Otherworld Sapling Trader&r will exchange such natural saplings for a stable variant that can be harvested by anyone, and will drop the same stable saplings when harvested.
task.48693C868CF2C4D6.title: Summon an &7Otherworld Sapling Trader
quest.50E0C5ECFB5B02E1.title: &7Foliot &fOtherstone Trader
quest.50E0C5ECFB5B02E1.quest_desc1: The &7Otherstone Trader&r allows you to get more &aOtherstone&r than using &aSpirit Fire&r.
quest.50E0C5ECFB5B02E1.quest_desc3: It is especially efficient if you want to use &aOtherstone&r as a building material.
task.4231E260B5663246.title: Summon an &7Otherstone Trader
quest.6F0C07BA71E2325D.title: &cDjinni Crusher
quest.6F0C07BA71E2325D.quest_desc1: The &cDjinni Crusher&r functions like all other &bCrushers&r, but provides 3x the output.
task.424E4C3828D04E2F.title: Summon a &cDjinni Crusher
quest.0BA61DBFC36F585E.title: &6Marid Crusher
quest.0BA61DBFC36F585E.quest_desc1: The &6Marid Crusher&r functions like all other &bCrushers&r, but provides 6x the output.
task.02E6504A12BEF04F.title: &fSummon a &6Marid Crusher
quest.548DEBAD9D4CB726.title: &dAfrit Crusher
quest.548DEBAD9D4CB726.quest_desc1: The &dAfrit Crusher&r functions like all other &bCrushers&r, but provides 4x the output.
task.5DE59DFE8D72E6F4.title: Summon &dAfrit Crusher
quest.0D926066D3D83196.title: &cDjinni Smelter
quest.0D926066D3D83196.quest_desc1: The &cDjinni Smelter&r functions like all other &bSmelters&r, but process things 50% faster than normal.
task.7675055D1AE5D019.title: Summon a &cDjinni Smelter
quest.38248F3AE03BE9F7.title: &dAfrit Smelter
quest.38248F3AE03BE9F7.quest_desc1: The &dAfrit Smelter&r functions like all other &bSmelters&r, but processes things 90% faster than normal.
task.5AC8CFBCB4375AC0.title: Summoned an &dAfrit Smelter
quest.6372CB70B09D27EA.title: &6Marid Smelter
quest.6372CB70B09D27EA.quest_desc1: The &6Marid Smelter&r functions like all other &bSmelters&r, but process things 99% faster than normal.
task.25225ED0412FB977.title: &fSummon a &6Marid Smelter
quest.3830D82DFA731ABA.title: &fWhite Chalk
quest.3830D82DFA731ABA.quest_desc1: If we want to play with &cDemons&r, we'll need a way to summon them with rituals. To do this, we need &aChalk&r.
quest.3830D82DFA731ABA.quest_desc3: &aChalk&r is used to draw glyphs for your &bRituals&r. You will come across many different colored &aChalks&r as you progress through &6Occultism&r.
quest.3830D82DFA731ABA.quest_desc5: By combining &aOtherworld Ashes&r and &aBurnt Otherstone&r, you can craft an &7Impure White Chalk&r, which can be thrown into &aSpirit Fire&r to purify it into &aWhite Chalk&r.
quest.3830D82DFA731ABA.quest_desc7: Chalk is pretty hard to scrub off of the ground. You can use a &aChalk Brush&r to get rid of any misplaced glyphs.
quest.0733AB66BFEB220E.title: &fBlack Chalk
quest.0733AB66BFEB220E.quest_desc1: Using &dSevira's Permanent Confinement&r, you can craft &dBlack Chalk&r.
quest.0733AB66BFEB220E.quest_desc3: This can be used to upgrade your existing &bPentacles&r, as well as being the highest tier &aFoundation Chalk&r.
quest.016E959A387A1E03.title: {"text": "Purple Chalk", "color": "#9D7AD0"}
quest.016E959A387A1E03.quest_desc1: ["Crushing endstone allows you to craft ", {"text": "Purple Chalk", "color": "#9D7AD0"}, ", which is the next tier of Chalk we'll need to perform better Rituals."]
quest.6E07405D08CCC2D4.title: [{"text": "", "color": "#FFFFFF"}, {"text": "Lime", "color": "#E2FC97"}, " & ", {"text": "Light Gray", "color": "#C2C2C2"}, " Chalks"]
quest.6E07405D08CCC2D4.quest_desc1: ["For the next tier of Chalks to upgrade your existing ", {"text": "Pentacles", "color": "#55FFFF"}, ", you'll need ", {"text": "Lime Chalk", "color": "#E2FC97"}, ", ", {"text": "Light Gray Chalk", "color": "#C2C2C2"}, ", and some skeleton skulls."]
quest.0017F48E23512C75.title: [{"text": "", "color": "#FFFFFF"}, {"text": "Orange", "color": "#FCA645"}, " & ", {"text": "Gray", "color": "#929292"}, " Chalks"]
quest.0017F48E23512C75.quest_desc1: ["You can now upgrade your existing ", {"text": "Pentacles", "color": "#55FFFF"}, " with ", {"text": "Orange", "color": "#FCA645"}, " and ", {"text": "Gray", "color": "#929292"}, " chalks, and ", {"text": "Spirit Attuned Crystals", "color": "#FF55FF"}, "."]
quest.2F0C6EA5380AA661.title: &cRed Chalk
quest.2F0C6EA5380AA661.quest_desc1: With &cAfrit Essence&r, you can create the next tier of Chalk: &cRed Chalk&r.
quest.4F7B94DCD4B52CE4.title: &aHedyrin's Lure
quest.4F7B94DCD4B52CE4.quest_desc1: Using &eYellow Chalk&r, you can attract a &7Foliot&r to possess a nearby creature.
quest.4F7B94DCD4B52CE4.quest_desc3: Most &ePossesion&r and &eFamiliar Rituals&r are optional, but you will still need to complete their &bPentacles&r to reach the end-game.
quest.4F7B94DCD4B52CE4.quest_desc5: Simply click on the checkmark to progress the questline.
task.3C308BEEE3895C69.title: &bPentacle&r Complete
quest.32E0A399AFBE3099.title: &aThe Quest For More Chalk
quest.32E0A399AFBE3099.quest_desc1: To summon higher tier &bSpirits&r, we're going to need better chalk.
quest.32E0A399AFBE3099.quest_desc3: This requires a new type of &bPentacle&r called &aEziveus' Spectral Compulsion&r. Make sure to use the guidebook to help you create it!
quest.32E0A399AFBE3099.quest_desc5: This is the basic starting point for &eBinding Rituals&r. It binds a &7Foliot&r to your items, enhancing their functionality.
quest.32E0A399AFBE3099.quest_desc7: Some &eBinding Rituals&r are optional, but you will need most of them if you want to reach &6Occultism&r's end-game.
quest.5F0AAD028931A220.title: &cOphyx' Calling
quest.5F0AAD028931A220.quest_desc1: [ "With ", {"text": "Lime", "color": "#E2FC97"}, " and ", {"text": "Light Gray", "color": "#C2C2C2"}, " chalks, you can now upgrade your ", {"text": "Aviar's Circle", "color": "#55FFFF"}, " to ", {"text": "Ophynx' Calling", "color": "#FF5555"}, " to clear the weather, skip the night, or summon a variety of ", {"text": "Djinnis", "color": "#FF5555"}, "."]
task.41685895FDFE2D3B.title: &bPentacle&r Complete
quest.013375F170CE6A2F.title: &cIhagan's Enthrallment
quest.013375F170CE6A2F.quest_desc1: ["Using ", {"text": "Lime", "color": "#E2FC97"}, " and ", {"text": "Light Gray", "color": "#D6D6D6"}, " chalks, you can now attract a ", {"text": "Djinni", "color": "#FF5555"}, ", allowing possession and summoning of stronger creatures."]
quest.013375F170CE6A2F.quest_desc3: Most &ePossesion&r and &eFamiliar Rituals&r are optional, but you will still need to complete their &bPentacles&r to reach the end-game.
quest.013375F170CE6A2F.quest_desc5: Simply click on the checkmark to progress the questline.
task.72D916898EED9BF4.title: &bPentacle&r Complete
quest.4FD0504ADB98E0C0.title: &cStrigeor's Higher Binding
quest.4FD0504ADB98E0C0.quest_desc1: ["By upgrading your ", {"text": "Eziveus' Spectral Compulsion", "color": "#55FFFF"}, ", you can permanently bind a ", {"text": "Djinni", "color": "#FF5555"}, " into an item."]
quest.4FD0504ADB98E0C0.quest_desc3: Some &eBinding Rituals&r are optional, but you will need most of them if you want to reach &6Occultism&r end-game.
quest.4FD0504ADB98E0C0.quest_desc5: Click on the checkmark to progress the questline.
task.1D13D516425A8FDE.title: &bPentacle&r Complete
quest.23B06AB674CC7193.title: &dSevira's Permanent Confinement
quest.23B06AB674CC7193.quest_desc1: ["Upgrading ", {"text": "Strigeor's Higher Binding", "color": "#FF5555"}, " with ", {"text": "Orange", "color": "#FCA645"}, " and ", {"text": "Gray", "color": "#929292"}, " chalks, and ", {"text": "Spirit Attuned Crystals", "color": "#FF55FF"}, " allows you to permanently bind the powerful ", {"text": "Afrit", "color": "#FF55FF"}, " to an item."]
quest.23B06AB674CC7193.quest_desc3: Some &eBinding Rituals&r are optional, but you will need most of them if you want to reach &6Occultism&r end-game.
quest.23B06AB674CC7193.quest_desc5: Click on the checkmark to progress the questline.
task.5A4A1F326C2F75BC.title: &bPentacle&r Complete
quest.53B7A49C8138D3B0.title: &cAbras' Open Commanding Conjure
quest.53B7A49C8138D3B0.quest_desc1: ["Using ", {"text": "Gray", "color": "#929292"}, " and ", {"text": "Orange", "color": "#FCA645"}, " chalks, and ", {"text": "Spirit Attune Crystals", "color": "#FF55FF"}, ", you can now control an ", {"text": "Afrit", "color": "#FF55FF"}, " to possess a zombie pigman, dropping ", {"text": "Demonic Meat", "color": "#55FF55"}, " upon its death."]
quest.583456FAA606B5B4.title: &dAbras' Commanding Conjure
quest.583456FAA606B5B4.quest_desc1: Stabilizing &bAbra's Commanding Conjure&r with &cRed Chalk&r allows you to command an &dAfrit Spirit&r to possess and summon powerful creatures.
quest.583456FAA606B5B4.quest_desc3: Most &ePossesion&r and &eFamiliar Rituals&r are optional, but you will still need to complete their &bPentacles&r to reach the end-game.
quest.583456FAA606B5B4.quest_desc5: Simply click on the checkmark to progress the questline.
task.1BB51471E9C7949F.title: &bPentacle&r Complete
quest.7E909792A1E7CFD1.title: &dAbras' Conjure
quest.7E909792A1E7CFD1.quest_desc1: With &cRed Chalk&r, you can upgrade your &cAbras' Open Conjure&r to the next tier: &dAbras' Conjure&r.
quest.7E909792A1E7CFD1.quest_desc3: That's right. We just closed it.
quest.7E909792A1E7CFD1.quest_desc5: This &bPentacle&r allows you to safely summon and bind &dAfrits&r, powerful &eFamiliars&r, and fully control the weather.
task.6A2D276566E902AD.title: &bPentacle&r Complete
quest.1A3C52B662D8237B.title: &6Fatma's Incentivized Attraction
quest.1A3C52B662D8237B.quest_desc1: With the power of &9Blue Chalk&r, you are capable of drawing &6Fatma's Incentivized Attraction&r to summon and bind &6Marids&r to your will.
task.53A96A871A0DB011.title: &bPentacle&r Complete
quest.38D3BE7AF6792B8D.quest_desc1: With the power of &9Blue Chalk&r and &dWither Skeleton Skulls&r you are able to summon and bind &6Marids&r into powerful beings.
quest.38D3BE7AF6792B8D.quest_desc3: Most &ePossesion&r and &eFamiliar Rituals&r are optional, but you will still need to complete their &bPentacles&r to reach the end-game.
quest.38D3BE7AF6792B8D.quest_desc5: Simply click on the checkmark to progress the questline.
quest.4A63B415FED7E777.title: &6Uphyxes Inverted Tower
quest.4A63B415FED7E777.quest_desc1: &6Uphyxes Inverted Tower&r combines the powers of &9Blue Chalk&r and &dWither Skeleton Skulls&r, allowing you to summon and bind &6Marids&r into extremely powerful items.
quest.4A63B415FED7E777.quest_desc3: Some &eBinding Rituals&r are optional, but you will need most of them if you want to reach &6Occultism&r end-game.
task.373810705E9367E4.title: &bPentacle&r Complete
quest.1DCCF9A58A557282.title: &9Blue Chalk
quest.1DCCF9A58A557282.quest_desc1: With &6Marid Essence&r, you can now craft &9Blue Chalk&r.
quest.1DCCF9A58A557282.quest_desc3: This is used to upgrade your existing &bPentacles&r to the next tier.
quest.1CD21F10064581B4.title: &aGreen Chalk
quest.5D5D0878275558BC.title: {"text": "Light Blue Chalk", "color": "#A6CAFC"}
quest.1CAA9A2F7F3EDAD3.title: {"text": "Pink Chalk", "color": "#FCB1D0"}
quest.43BF1E0CE33F8BB7.title: {"text": "Brown Chalk", "color": "#AA7B5A"}
quest.43BF1E0CE33F8BB7.quest_desc1: If we want to commune with the &5Eldritch Gods&r, we need the right colors of &bChalk&r.
quest.43BF1E0CE33F8BB7.quest_desc3: ["Using ", {"text": "Xeovrenth Adjure", "color": "#FFAA00"}, ", ", {"text": "Cruelty Essence", "color": "#FF5555"}, " can be used to craft ", {"text": "Brown Chalk", "color": "#AA7B5A"}, "."]
quest.337838FB759E4377.title: {"text": "Magenta Chalk", "color": "#D17CC9"}
quest.337838FB759E4377.quest_desc1: I'm starting to think the &5Eldritch Gods&r might have had a hand in creating everything.
quest.337838FB759E4377.quest_desc3: ["To create ", {"text": "Magenta Chalk", "color": "#D17CC9"}, ", you will need ", {"text": "Dragonyst Dust", "color": "#FF55FF"}, "."]
quest.337838FB759E4377.quest_desc5: This can only be acquired by using the &6Uphyxes Inverted Tower&r Pentacle.
quest.504EEAA75990C78C.title: {"text": "Cyan Chalk", "color": "#3DADAD"}
quest.504EEAA75990C78C.quest_desc1: To get &bCyan Chalk&r, you'll need a &6Marid Crusher&r to crush up &dEcho Shards&r for you.
quest.504EEAA75990C78C.quest_desc3: &5Eldritch Gods&r need very specific chalk to commune with them.
quest.504EEAA75990C78C.quest_desc5: They might be colorblind, just like Alfred!
quest.4113BA0BADB486F0.title: &fMore About &bRituals \&\ Pentacles
quest.4113BA0BADB486F0.quest_desc1: Our new friend should make it easy for us to make &eCrushed Endstone&r, but before we continue, it's important to understand more about &bRituals&r and &bPentacles&r!
quest.4113BA0BADB486F0.quest_desc3: In short, a &bPentacle&r is a formation of glyphs, bowls, and stabilizers placed around the &aGolden Sacrificial Bowl&r.
quest.4113BA0BADB486F0.quest_desc5: A &bRitual&r is the act of offering items to summon a &bSpirit&r from &9The Otherworld&r.
quest.4113BA0BADB486F0.quest_desc7: There are 4 different types of &bPentacles&r, and each can be upgraded as you progress.
quest.4113BA0BADB486F0.quest_desc9: This means that you only need four 19x19 areas to set up all 4 types of &bPentacles&r!
quest.4113BA0BADB486F0.quest_desc11: ["", {"text": "Rituals", "color": "#55FFFF"}, " are mainly split into four categories: ", {"text": "Binding", "color":"#FFFF55", "underlined": true, "clickEvent": {"action": "change_page", "value": "51D07B8762C46982"}}, ", ", {"text": "Possession", "color":"#FFFF55", "underlined": true, "clickEvent": { "action": "change_page", "value": "0EBEF0B2D2F13C3D"}}, ", ", {"text": "Familiar", "color":"#FFFF55", "underlined": true, "clickEvent": { "action": "change_page", "value": "6338A56F731A5F25"}}, ", and ", {"text": "Summoning", "color":"#FFFF55", "underlined": true, "clickEvent": { "action": "change_page", "value": "6137DE875E13EF72"}}, "."]
quest.4113BA0BADB486F0.quest_desc13: Your &aAviar's Circle&r &bPentacle&r is considered a &aSummoning Pentacle&r.
quest.4113BA0BADB486F0.quest_desc15: The next upgrade for it is &cOphyx's Calling&r, which allows you to summon &cDjinni&r.
quest.4113BA0BADB486F0.quest_desc17: When completing a &bRitual&r, a purple particle effect will show that the &bRitual&r is successful and in progress.
quest.4113BA0BADB486F0.quest_desc19: If a &bRitual&r shows gray particles above the &aGolden Sacrificial Bowl&r, then additional requirements need to be fulfilled, such as item use or a &cliving sacrifice&r.
quest.4BCA3115FA95C81F.title: &eEssence Decay
quest.4BCA3115FA95C81F.quest_desc1: Trader, time, and weather &bSpirits&r experience &eEssence Decay&r while outside &9The Otherworld&r.
quest.4BCA3115FA95C81F.quest_desc3: Stronger &bSpirits&r can resist this decay, but only the strongest can fully overcome its effect. Once fully decayed, a &bSpirit&r will disappear and return to &9The Otherworld&r.
quest.4BCA3115FA95C81F.quest_desc5: One can slow or even stop this decay by binding the &bSpirit&r to an object or living being. Additionally, the &bPentacle&r used can influence the effects of &eEssence Decay&r to some extent.
task.3B91067C07169C66.title: Spiritual Decay
quest.782A8F5006E367E0.title: &aUsing Items In Rituals
quest.782A8F5006E367E0.quest_desc1: Some &bRituals&r require the use of certain items to be performed.
quest.782A8F5006E367E0.quest_desc3: Use the item within 16 blocks of the &aGolden Sacrificial Bowl&r to proceed the &bRitual&r.
quest.782A8F5006E367E0.quest_desc5: &eImporant&r: Before using the item, start the ritual. Gray particles indicate that the ritual is ready for the item use.
task.67A22BBA4C91522B.title: Item Use
quest.4DB0A34E6C46B0B8.title: &bSacrifices In Rituals
quest.4DB0A34E6C46B0B8.quest_desc1: Some &bRituals&r require the &bSacrifice&r of a living being to provide the necessary energy to summon the &bSpirit&r.
quest.4DB0A34E6C46B0B8.quest_desc3: To perform a &bSacrifice&r, kill an animal within 8 blocks of the &aGolden Sacrificial Bowl&r.
quest.4DB0A34E6C46B0B8.quest_desc5: Only kills by players count as &bSacrifice&r.
task.3F405FB146055F6D.title: &fSacrifices
quest.4EFE71837197FB63.title: &dRepairing a Miner
quest.4EFE71837197FB63.quest_desc1: &eMiner Spirits&r decay over time, but with simple materials, an &dAfrit&r can repair a &eMiner Spirit&r.
task.6F06D38FC0B0F1EF.title: &fRepair a Miner
quest.68A9006D2FE4A38D.title: &aTier 1 Dimensional Storage Stabilizer
quest.68A9006D2FE4A38D.quest_desc1: &aStorage Stabilizers&r increase the storage space in the &aStorage Actuator&r.
quest.68A9006D2FE4A38D.quest_desc3: Higher tier &aStorage Stabilizers&r provide a bigger storage increase for both items and item types.
quest.68A9006D2FE4A38D.quest_desc5: &aStorage Stabilizers&r can be placed up to five blocks away, facing the &aDimensional Matrix&r texture. Check the &aDictionary of Spirits&r for the exact layout.
quest.68A9006D2FE4A38D.quest_desc7: Each &aTier 1 Dimensional Storage Stablizer&r adds 512000 items, and 64 item types, up to four &aStablizers&r.
quest.65EB766D0445C1A6.title: &cTier 2 Dimensional Storage Stabilizer
quest.65EB766D0445C1A6.quest_desc1: It is safe to destroy a &aStorage Stabilizer&r to ugprade it. The items in the &aStorage Actuator&r won't be lost or dropped, but you won't be able to add new items if until it has free slots again.
quest.65EB766D0445C1A6.quest_desc3: Each &cTier 2 Dimensional Storage Stablizer&r adds 1024000 items, and 128 item types, up to four &aStablizers&r.
quest.28493A960B770451.title: &dTier 3 Dimensional Storage Stabilizer
quest.28493A960B770451.quest_desc1: Each &dTier 3 Dimensional Storage Stablizer&r adds 2048000 items, and 256 item types, up to four &aStablizers&r.
quest.349143B50076A759.title: &6Tier 4 Dimensional Storage Stabilizer
quest.349143B50076A759.quest_desc1: Each &6Tier 4 Dimensional Storage Stablizer&r adds 4096000 items, and 512 item types, up to four &aStablizers&r.
quest.3AF598F0517B7BA6.title: &aRemote Network Access
quest.3AF598F0517B7BA6.quest_desc1: The &aStable Wormhole&r allows access to a Dimensional Storage from a remote destination.
quest.3AF598F0517B7BA6.quest_desc3: Shift-click the &aDimensional Storage Actuator&r to link it, then place the &aStable Wormhole&r in the world to use as a remote access point.
quest.1F09A28387DA18A6.title: &fNBT Tags \&\ Storage Logistics
quest.1F09A28387DA18A6.quest_desc1: Items with unique properties (NBT Data), such as damaged or enchanted equipment will take up one item type for each variation.
quest.1F09A28387DA18A6.quest_desc3: For example, two wooden swords with two different damage values will take up two item types.
quest.1F09A28387DA18A6.quest_desc5: Other mods can access the storage controller just like a shulker box, but some mods may struggle to read stack sizes.
quest.1F09A28387DA18A6.quest_desc8: When inserting items, the &aStorage Actuator&r will maximize performance automatically, minimizing impact on game performance.
quest.1F09A28387DA18A6.quest_desc10: When extracting items, however, it is recommended to use a &7Foliot Transporter&r, even if it only places the items inside a chest next to the &aStorage Actuator&r.
quest.1F09A28387DA18A6.quest_desc12: This is because, when extracting a specific item from the &aStorage Actuator&r, most pipes will cycle through every single stored item one by one, massively impacting game performance, especially on servers.
task.45CC5A8334951331.title: I have read and agreed to the Terms and Conditions

task.51D92D338F879BE2.title: Complete This Quest
quest.081F9BFA0347582F.title: &cCursed Honey
quest.081F9BFA0347582F.quest_desc1: The next color of Chalk requires you to get some &cCursed Honey&r.
quest.081F9BFA0347582F.quest_desc3: To get this material, we'll need to use &cIhagan's Enthrallment&r to summon a possessed bee.
quest.081F9BFA0347582F.quest_desc5: This will require a tier 2 &aPossession Pentacle&r.

quest.10E8E47BEFCA8F97.title: &dOsorin's Unbound Calling
quest.10E8E47BEFCA8F97.quest_desc1: &bOsorin's Unbound Calling&r is used to contact a variety of wild &bSpirits&r for many purposes.
quest.10E8E47BEFCA8F97.quest_desc3: There are a LOT of summons, so you can simply click the checkmark to progress the questline.
quest.10E8E47BEFCA8F97.quest_desc6: - Weak Breeze: &cTrial Key&r, &cOminous Bottle&r, and related pottery sherds and music discs
quest.10E8E47BEFCA8F97.quest_desc7: - Breeze: &dOminous Trial Key&r, and related music discs, banner patterns, and smithing templates
quest.10E8E47BEFCA8F97.quest_desc8: - Strong Breeze: &6Heavy Core&r, and related pottery sherds, music discs, banner patterns, and smithing templates
quest.10E8E47BEFCA8F97.quest_desc12: - Wild Illagers: &dTotem of Undying&r (1) and related smithing templates
quest.10E8E47BEFCA8F97.quest_desc16: - &aDrowned Horde&r: Sniffer Egg, Turtle Egg, and Ocean related pottery sherds
quest.10E8E47BEFCA8F97.quest_desc17: - &aHusk Horde&r: Desert related smithing templates and pottery sherds
quest.10E8E47BEFCA8F97.quest_desc18: - &aSilverfish Horde&r: Ruin related smithing templates, music discs, and pottery sherds
quest.10E8E47BEFCA8F97.quest_desc21: - &aCommon Animals&r: Chickens, Cows, Pigs, Sheep, Squid, or Wolves
quest.10E8E47BEFCA8F97.quest_desc22: - &aRideable Animals&r: Camels, Donkeys, Horses, Llamas, Pigs, Skeleton Horses, Trader Llamas, or Zombie Horses
quest.10E8E47BEFCA8F97.quest_desc23: - &aSmall Animals&r: Allay, Bats, Bees, Parrots, Cats, Ocelots, Foxes, or Rabbits
quest.10E8E47BEFCA8F97.quest_desc24: - &aSpecial Animals&r: Armadillos, Goats, Iron Golems, Mooshrooms, Pandas, Polar Bears, or Sniffers
quest.10E8E47BEFCA8F97.quest_desc25: - &aWater Animals&r: Axolotl, Frogs, Dolphins, Cod, Salmon, Tropical Fishes, Pufferfishes, Squids/Glow Squids, Tadpoles, Turtles, or Snow Golems

quest.4C9473D2E4149656.title: &6Ronaza's Contact
quest.4C9473D2E4149656.quest_desc1: &6Ronaza's Contact&r is the most complex and advanced &bPentacle&r, combining all human knowledge of &9The Otherworld&r to allow communication with the &5Eldritch Gods&r.
quest.4C9473D2E4149656.quest_desc3: Using this &bPentacle&r, you can craft the strongest items in &6Occultism&r.
quest.739F075AA8F4DA49.title: &dFeeling Even Lazier???
quest.739F075AA8F4DA49.quest_desc1: The &dArtisanal Ritual Satchel&r functions similarly to the &aApprentice Ritual Satchel&r.
quest.739F075AA8F4DA49.quest_desc3: However, it can not only instantly complete the entire &bPentacle&r at once (if provided all materials), but it can also pick up all blocks used in the &bPentacle&r by right-clicking the &aGolden Sacrificial Bowl&r.
quest.0C24D8CD961D86B2.title: &cAbras' Open Conjure
quest.0C24D8CD961D86B2.quest_desc1: ["With ", {"text": "Gray", "color": "#929292"}, " and ", {"text": "Orange", "color": "#FCA645"}, " chalks, you can now upgrade your ", {"text": "Ophynx' Calling", "color": "#FF5555"}, " to ", {"text": "Abras' Open Conjure", "color": "#FF55FF"}, "."]
quest.0C24D8CD961D86B2.quest_desc3: This &bRitual&r is only used to summon an &dUnbound Afrit&r. Killing it will grant you its essence, allowing you to make &cRed Chalk&r.
quest.0C24D8CD961D86B2.quest_desc5: Unfortunately, you might have to sacrifice ol' Bessy.
quest.3964E9A95D52B0FD.title: &dAbras' Fortified Conjure
quest.3964E9A95D52B0FD.quest_desc1: The next tier of &bSummoning Pentacle&r is &dAbras' Fortified Conjure&r.
quest.3964E9A95D52B0FD.quest_desc3: This &bRitual&r is only used to summon an &6Unbound Marid&r. Killing it will grant you its essence, allowing you to make &9Blue Chalk&r.
quest.0D0892AD0DB44795.title: &fSpirit Attuned Gem
quest.0D0892AD0DB44795.quest_desc1: &aSpirit Attuned Gems&r can be used in a variety of crafting recipes and &bRituals&r, but is most commonly used to make the &aDivination Rod&r and &dSpirit Attuned Crystals&r.
quest.0D0892AD0DB44795.quest_desc3: To acquire a &aSpirit Attuned Gems&r, simply toss a diamond into &aSpirit Fire&r.
quest.0D0892AD0DB44795.quest_desc5: Note: &dSpirit Attuned Crystals&r are great to use in your Enchanting setups!
quest.50F2EDF92D289869.title: &fOtherstone
quest.50F2EDF92D289869.quest_desc1: &aOtherstone&r can be acquired by tossing andesite into &aSpirit Fire&r.
quest.50F2EDF92D289869.quest_desc3: Smelting &aOtherstone&r will give you &aBurnt Otherstone&r - a key component used to craft the White Chalk.
quest.10E3AB8F0B7B9F30.title: &9Otherworld &fLog
quest.10E3AB8F0B7B9F30.quest_desc1: Throwing a regular &2oak sapling&r into &dSpirit Fire&r will convert it into an &aOak Sapling&r from the &9Otherworld&r.
quest.10E3AB8F0B7B9F30.quest_desc3: When planted and grown, this tree will look like a regular sapling. Those under the effects of the &bThird Eye&r can see what it really is!
quest.10E3AB8F0B7B9F30.quest_desc5: Chopping this tree down while under the effects of the Third Eye should drop you &aOtherworld Logs&r, which can be used in crafting recipes or rituals.
quest.10E3AB8F0B7B9F30.quest_desc7: Throwing the logs into &dSpirit Fire&r will give you &aOtherworld Ashes&r - a key component used to craft &aWhite Chalk&r.
quest.42B887FC6D9FE211.title: &fYour First Ritual
quest.42B887FC6D9FE211.quest_desc1: For our first &bRitual&r, we're going to summon a &7Foliot Crusher&r using the &bAviar's Circle Pentacle&r.
quest.42B887FC6D9FE211.quest_desc3: The easiest way to do this is to navigate to the &bPentacles&r tab in your guidebook, then find &bAviar's Circle&r. On the right side, you should see a render of it with an &beye icon&r in the bottom right.
quest.42B887FC6D9FE211.quest_desc5: Clicking this will allow you to place a &bhologram&r to help you create the pentacle!
quest.42B887FC6D9FE211.quest_desc7: Once you've drawn and completed the layout of the &bPentacle&r, you can place down 4 &aSacrificial Bowls&r anywhere within 8 blocks of the &2Golden Sacrificial Bowl&r.
quest.42B887FC6D9FE211.quest_desc9: You might notice that most &bPentacles&r have the perfect spot for these!
quest.42B887FC6D9FE211.quest_desc11: Next, you'll place down the items needed in the &aSacrificial Bowls&r, then place in the &aBook of Binding: Foliot (Bound)&r into the center &6Golden Sacrificial Bowl&r.
quest.42B887FC6D9FE211.quest_desc13: Once all items are in place, you can right click the Golden Sacrificial Bowl and start the ritual!
quest.42B887FC6D9FE211.quest_desc15: The items inside the bowls will be consumed until there are none left, at which point the &7Foliot Crusher&r will appear next to the &aGolden Sacrificial Bowl&r.
quest.42B887FC6D9FE211.quest_desc17: Like all other &bCrushers&r, the &7Foliot Crusher&r will grind down items into dust, providing 2x the output.
quest.42B887FC6D9FE211.quest_desc19: The Crusher is also needed to create the next color of Chalk we'll need!
quest.73090FDB6ABAF9C3.title: &dGuardian Familiar
quest.73090FDB6ABAF9C3.quest_desc1: The &dGuardian Familiar&r can prevent its master's death by sacrificing one of its limbs.
quest.73090FDB6ABAF9C3.quest_desc3: A &dGuardian&r spawns with a random amount of limbs, but upgrading it with the &aBlacksmith Familiar&r will regenerate one limb once.
task.34C81AE26CFD0DE9.title: &fSummon a &aGuardian
quest.6750DD01D865937D.title: &5Stabilized Dimensional Storage Actuator
quest.6750DD01D865937D.quest_desc1: The &5Stabilized Dimensional Storage Actuator&r is not affected by &aStorage Stabilizers&r, but comes prebuilt with a &6Tier 4 Dimensional Storage Stablizer&r.

quest.38E07A5510D2ACEC.quest_desc1: Using &aHedyrin's Lure&r you can summon &ePossessed Animals&r that can be tamed or killed for loot.
quest.38E07A5510D2ACEC.quest_desc5: &aRandom Common Animal&r: One of - Chicken, Cow, Pig, Sheep, Squid, or Wolf

quest.6F37482EE0AB4ABD.title: &dIesnium Pickaxe
quest.6F37482EE0AB4ABD.quest_desc1: The &dIesnium Pickaxe&r can be used to mine &9Otherworld Materials&r like &dIesnium Ore&r.
quest.6F37482EE0AB4ABD.quest_desc3: It is faster and more durable than the &aInfused Piackaxe&r.
quest.078CAC5AA9A2D84D.title: &cStorage Access On-The-Go
quest.078CAC5AA9A2D84D.quest_desc1: Shift + right-click a &aDimensional Storage Actuator&r with a &cStorage Accesor&r to link them, allowing you to access your items from anywhere in the world, even across dimensions.
quest.047AA74F1CED211E.title: &cDimensional Storage
quest.047AA74F1CED211E.quest_desc1: Combine the &aStorage Actuator Base&r with a &cDimensional Crystal Matrix&r to make a &aDimensional Storage Actuator&r, and place it down to begin storing your items.
quest.047AA74F1CED211E.quest_desc3: Without &aStabilizers&r, the &aDimensional Storage Actuator&r can hold 256000 items with 128 item types.

task.6B8157688CD23283.title: Summoned a &aBlacksmith
quest.65BCDCF0CEB69283.title: &cChimera and Niggurath Familar
quest.65BCDCF0CEB69283.quest_desc1: The &aChimera&r behaves a little differently to most other &eFamiliars&r.
quest.65BCDCF0CEB69283.quest_desc3: It can grow when fed meat, increasing its damage and speed. Once fully grown, feeding it a &dGolden Apple&r will detach the &dGoat&r to become its own rideable mount.
quest.65BCDCF0CEB69283.quest_desc5: When upgraded, it will get a warning bell that attracts nearby enemies in a large radius when hit.
quest.65BCDCF0CEB69283.quest_desc7: The &dGoat&r can also be used to summon a &dShub Niggurath &eFamiliar&r.
quest.65BCDCF0CEB69283.quest_desc10: To summon &dShub Niggurath&r, take the &dGoat&r to a forest biome and feed it any black dye, flint, and an eye of ender.
quest.65BCDCF0CEB69283.quest_desc12: The &dShub Niggurath&r spawns small version of itself to fight for you, and will have the same bell as the &dGoat&r when upgraded.

quest.1B9C122BAE5A64BC.quest_desc3: They will keep you company, cook for you, and extend your potion effects.

quest.627CC178ACA711E6.title: &6Iesnium Golem
quest.627CC178ACA711E6.quest_desc1: The &6Iesnium Golem&r is an upgraded iron golem, dealing a lot more damage, and being completely invulnerable to damage.
quest.627CC178ACA711E6.quest_desc3: You can recall the &6Iesnium Golem&r by hitting them while crouched.
task.55CC22F0E7476029.title: &fSummoned an &6Iesnium Golem
quest.44E044BA9C152631.title: &fA Note For The Questline
quest.44E044BA9C152631.quest_desc1: In some quests, you'll notice tasks that have &aoptional&r attached to them.
quest.44E044BA9C152631.quest_desc3: Most of the time, this is done so you can click them to see the recipe for certain rituals!
quest.44E044BA9C152631.quest_desc5: Keep an eye out for what is required as lots of quests have optional tasks to complete.
